Reviews.Content: deira luxury suites refridgerators dishwasher usual amenities im demanding customer dont service cafeteria choices hotel reasonably priced gift shop mall street inexpensive grocery store attached staff friendly prices cab drivers hang parking lot employer hotel lot im happy
